item.title: Plan-on-Graph: Self-Correcting Adaptive Planning of Large Language Model on Knowledge Graphs
item.description: Plan-on-Graph (PoG) revolutionizes KG-augmented LLMs with a self-correcting adaptive planning paradigm, enabling more efficient and accurate reasoning over knowledge graphs by dynamically adjusting ex…
